main event: A yellow rod-shaped object was observed moving from east to west at high speed for 2 minutes in January 1957.
interesting points: The object was tracked by ground radar.,The sighting occurred at an altitude of 45 degrees off the horizon.,The flight pattern is characteristic of unidentified aerial objects., There are comments suggesting the object was under intelligent control., There is a hand-drawn sketch of oval-shaped objects in the report.
witness description: There is no identification of individuals, only a witness noted.
